description.zh-cn: 中国教育家、高级工程师，曾任北京广播学院院长。中国共产党优秀党员。
description.en: A Chinese educator and senior engineer who served as the president of Beijing Broadcasting Institute. An outstanding member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 常振铮的出生地，位于河北省，现为北京市房山区。
description.en: The birthplace of Chang Zhenzheng, located in Hebei Province, now Fangshan District of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都，常振铮的逝世地。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China, and the place of Chang Zhenzheng's death.

description.zh-cn: 中国著名高等学府，常振铮的母校，他也曾在此担任兼职教授。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher learning in China, the alma mater of Chang Zhenzheng, where he also served as an adjunct professor.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的海上武装力量。
description.en: The naval warfare branch of the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军海军航空兵部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军航空兵部

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军的下属部门，常振铮曾在此任职。
description.en: A department within the People's Liberation Army Navy where Chang Zhenzheng once served.

description.zh-cn: 中国传媒大学的前身，常振铮曾长期在此任教并担任院长。
description.en: The predecessor of the Communication University of China, where Chang Zhenzheng taught for a long time and served as president.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国广播电影电视部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广播电影电视部
en: Ministry of Radio, Film, and Television of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经的组成部门。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的广播电视行业学术团体。
description.en: An academic society for the radio and television industry in China.

description.zh-cn: 北京市的电子信息科技工作者组成的学术性社会团体。
description.en: An academic social organization composed of electronic information science and technology workers in Beijing.

en: State Administration of Radio, Film, and Television

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院负责广播电影电视事业管理的直属机构。
description.en: A direct subordinate agency of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for the administration of radio, film, and television industries.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由北京广播学院更名而来的高等学府。
description.en: An institution of higher learning renamed from Beijing Broadcasting Institute.
Studied in the Telecommunications Group of the Department of Electrical Engineering.

description.zh-cn: 常振铮是一名中国共产党党员，并被评为优秀共产党员。
description.en: Chang Zhenzheng was a member of the Communist Party of China and was recognized as an Outstanding Communist Party Member.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军海军航空兵部

position.en: Deputy Chief of the Radio Division

position.zh-cn: 无线电系教师、党总支委员、系主任
position.en: Teacher, Party Branch Committee Member, and Department Head of the Radio Department
Member of the Standing Committee of the Party Committee, Vice President
Member of the Standing Committee of the Party Committee, President

description.zh-cn: 在1983年7月至1985年9月期间，同时主持学院党委工作。
description.en: From July 1983 to September 1985, he also presided over the party committee work of the institute.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国广播电影电视部

position.en: Member of the Standing Committee of the Science and Technology Commission
Vice Chairman of the Broadcasting Committee
Consultant to the Association for Science and Technology for the Aged

description.zh-cn: 北京广播学院是中国传媒大学的前身。
description.en: Beijing Broadcasting Institute is the predecessor of the Communication University of China.
